pageDescription: I created this website with the intention of being a place where I can better present my work and skills, ando also share my knowledge, thoughts and ideas.

introduction.text: Hello, my name is Pietro and I'm a dev fascinated by technology. In the last few years I have been studying and developing systems, being present and learning about each stage of development, from solution conception, through technical and architectural decisions, development, testing, deployment and maintenance.

about.title: about
about.text: In this section you will find information about my education, experiences and specific knowledge of technology (such as programming languages, frameworks, tools, etc.).

articles.title: articles
articles.text: I usually write articles to solidify the knowledge gained while solving a specific problem. Here you can find some articles I've written about technologies I'm currently studying or have already studied.
articles.imageAlt: A paper and a writing pen drawing symbolizing an article.

projects.title: projects
projects.text: Here you can find any project that I think people might be interested in. Feel free to make suggestions or questions.
